Listing 2: An OBJ Cube

o cube1

mtllib cube.mtl                                                              

v -5.000000 -5.000000 -5.000000
v -5.000000 -5.000000 5.000000
v -5.000000 5.000000 -5.000000
v -5.000000 5.000000 5.000000
v 5.000000 -5.000000 -5.000000
v 5.000000 -5.000000 5.000000
v 5.000000 5.000000 -5.000000
v 5.000000 5.000000 5.000000
# 8 vertices

vn  -1.000000 0.000000 0.000000
vn  0.000000 0.000000 1.000000
vn  1.000000 0.000000 0.000000
vn  0.000000 0.000000 -1.000000
vn  0.000000 -1.000000 0.000000
vn  0.000000 1.000000 0.000000
# 6 normals

vt  0.000000 0.000000
vt  0.000000 1.000000
vt  1.000000 0.000000
vt  1.000000 1.000000
# 4 texture vertices

usemtl mat1_FACE
f 1/2/1 2/4/1 4/3/1
f 1/2/1 4/3/1 3/1/1
f 2/2/2 6/4/2 8/3/2
f 2/2/2 8/3/2 4/1/2
f 6/2/3 5/4/3 7/3/3
f 6/2/3 7/3/3 8/1/3
f 5/2/4 1/4/4 3/3/4
f 5/2/4 3/3/4 7/1/4
f 5/2/5 6/4/5 2/3/5
f 5/2/5 2/3/5 1/1/5
f 3/2/6 4/4/6 8/3/6
f 3/2/6 8/3/6 7/1/6
# 12 elements
